node.name: Canoo Eclipse IDE Integration Plug-in for UltraLightClient
node.shortdescription:
Dedicated wizards help in creating new UltraLightClient projects in Eclipse, automatically linking all necessary libraries and defining a clean structure. In addition, this free plug-in streamlines the export procedure to deploy a productive application as servlet, with client access options as applet or as Java Web Start application.
The plug-in source code and documentation is available at the UltraLightClient Community website (http://ulc-community.canoo.com)
node.body:
Dedicated wizards help in creating new UltraLightClient projects in Eclipse, automatically linking all necessary libraries and defining a clean structure. In addition, this free plug-in streamlines the export procedure to deploy a productive application as servlet, with client access options as applet or as Java Web Start application.
The plug-in source code and documentation is available at the UltraLightClient Community website (http://ulc-community.canoo.com)
